r.s: These classes can create a clieop03 file for you which you can send to a Dutch Bank. Ofcourse you need also a Dutch bank account.
r.n: QA release Fixed class naming to be as per pear standards Fixed dir layout Tabs to Spaces Request #13475 BSD license change Doc Bug #13477 End-user documentation needed Bug #12402 Amount for transaction may not be negative Request #13054 Rabobank not accepting 000000 as ProcessDate Bug #13476 New line character must be selectable
